name: Cosmic Disclosure
color_description: Dark purple with green throat blending to chartreuse watermark.
description: Likely one of our best varieties ever. Cosmic Disclosure is fertile both ways, with tall upright thick scapes, large color fast flowers with a deep rich purple red. It combines Blue Dolphin and the base parent of our red program Starring Attracction to produce a result that is better than either parent. Originally, we wheren't a big fan of this one because it isn't a lavender, but it has proven itself to be too good to not introduce.

name: Feral Girls
,color_description: Medium purple with large green to bright yellow throat, darker veining on petals, twisted stamens with dark purple ends, and ruffled, reflexed edges.
description: One of our newest introductions. Named after two crazy friends, we couldn't not co-introduce this unique and FERAL GIRL. Excellent substance and pinched sepals the feral creature is far from the norm. CLICK LEARN MORE FOR AN IMAGE

name: Slow Painting
,color_description: lavender with lime green throat radiating outwards into bright yellow with soft greyed halo.
description: Our newest introduction we’ve been subtly holding onto for several years, with excellent habit and upright scapes. A fan favorite at shows, including winning best seedling. You cant walk past it without noticing its tall big pink blooms that glow in the afternoon sun. CLICK LEARN MORE FOR AN IMAGE

name: Dream Sequence
color_description: lavender blue self above green throat
description: One of our two main base plants. We love Dream Sequence, not only for its great habit of having tall upright scapes with great branching and bud count, but also its wonderful lavender purple color. It has long been a favorite, producing hundreds if not thousdands of seedlings. It is fertile both ways, and has been heavily used in the pursuit for diploid daylily with teeth.

name: I Only Have Eyes for You
color_description: Mauve purple with huge violet watermark.
image_url: I Only Have Eyes for You.jpg
description: A lavender mauv face with a pale rounded watermark exploding like a sunburst with a radiance to capture your heart. With one parent being a favorite from our red line, and a beloved southern vareity known to breed blue eyes as the other parent, a great option for a wide range of climates, with a distinct and striking face.

name: Jackie Canner
color_description: rich purple with violet watermark and pencil line violet edge with extended bloom
description: A rich grape purple. Truly one of the deepest and richest grape purple daylily I have ever seen. A beautiful bloom that I simply can't walk past whenever I see Jackie Canner in full bloom. she has great foliage, and she can rebloom some years.

name: Katherine Marin
color_description: cherry pink with gold edge above chartreuse throat
description: lovely southern style bloom. It has wonderful ruffling and a soft pink color, you just can't miss.Katherine Marin always catches my intrigue with its hint of peach just underneth the pink

name: Keeneland
color_description: red self above green to yellow throat
description: Keeneland, our red that perfectly encapuslates the region in whcih we live. A deep red to reprsent thuroughbred bred blood in Kentucky horse racing.

name: Kentucky Proud
color_description: light cream yellow with gold edge above green throat

name: Lavender Glaciers
color_description: Pale orchid bitone.
description: One of the most striking visions in our garden is Lavender Glaciers. A bi-tone that always draws people in with it's reliable and consistent cristate and bearding on petals with substance, on top of beautiful blue green foliage

name: Lines of Wisdom
color_description: dark burgundy with violet watermark and dark lines running through a bright lime green throat

name: Lisa Meadows
color_description: Pink.
description: A late variety with great branching an good habit.

name: Narrow Escape
color_description: Pale orchid with green throat extending far onto all segments.

name: Namaste
color_description: Violet purple with huge green throat and chartreuse watermark.
description: One of our favorite breeding varieties, consistently throws unique and unmatched seedlings. A personal favorite of ours. It has a striking sunfast face, with a beautiful and waxy violet purple petal and a large green throat to boot. The petals open reliably and with the slightest hint of ruffling. VERY FERTILE.

name: Malibu Moon
color_description: very light peach orange with orange rose ruffled edge

name: Mother
color_description: light cherry pink with softly ruffled edge, green throat and light cream watermark

name: Old Friends
color_description: yellow creamy blend with pink highlights and fringy gold edge above dark green throat
description: Likely our best tetraploid variety. It has such great habit. It has tall thick scapes, green blue foliage, and a flower to kill for. It is very pod fertile, and a wonderful peachy yellow flower that is diamond dusted and has teeth

name: Only in Dreams
color_description: light lavender blue with lime green eye above lime green throat

name: Pangea
color_description: rich purple with lighter watermark

name: Patti Byerley
color_description: Saturated, intense dark purple violet with bright, lime green throat brushing to lavender on petals.
description: Named after a dear friend, who is wild and ecclectic, this plant has the most intense and entrancing sunfast dark violet color with large chartreuse green eye and a distinguishing corrugated petal texture. Very unusual.

name: Persuade Me
color_description: Violet purple with lime green throat.
description: Another personal favorite, with a suede matt finish that is impossible to capture in photos, and a large flower that's completely sunfast with good staying power. Can only truly be appreciated in person.

name: Purple Pilgrim
color_description: Velvety dark purple.
description: Regal and majestic, she stands out against the crowd with her near black face with a starburst radiating from the eye carried into the petals via vibrant white midribs. Sunfast and sure to draw the eye and the attention of all garden guests. Purple Pilgrim is a combination of two of our most favorite parents, one giving it waxy substance, and tet like habit with tall thick scapes, and the other parent providing the best deep purple to near black color that is simply irresistable and unmatched in black daylily.

name: Redneck Red
color_description: orange red self above green throat
description: A tall sunfast red daylily that grows well and is one of our tallest tetraploid intro's. At the University of Kentucky Arboretum is a show stopping clump at the entrance of their garden.

name: Red Mile
color_description: red self above green throat

name: Ridgewood
color_description: Violet pink.
description: Nothing can compare. Ridgewood has it all, with its fabulous branching, high bud count, upright scapes, and dynamic captivating petals that are sunfast with a subtle watermark.  The color radiates in the evening sunset, and a true rock star in the hybriding garden. Represents a unique corner of our program that is commonly overlooked, it is a favorite breeder and is incredibly pollen fertile. You cannot go wrong.

name: Romance Is in the Air
color_description: clear lavender with large glowing lime green throat on petals and sepals

name: Suffice It to Say
color_description: Rich violet lavender bitone.
description: A glowing personality and a child out of two of our favorite parents and one of John's favorites for hybridizing.

name: The Heights
color_description: Light violet pink with emerald throat.
description: Named after our first neighborhood together in New Jersey, The Heights towers over its neighbors with tall scapes and a large bloom that stands up in the sky. A delightful lavender UF with so much potential.

name: Trapeze Artist
color_description: deep burgundy purple, yellow eye, green throat and slight ruffles

name: Vegas Vacation
color_description: salmon rose with frilly gold edge

name: Velvet Handcuffs
color_description: clear dark violet purple with large yellow eye and slight white midribs
description: A deep purple daylily variety that has been a part of our breeding program since its conception

name: Voluptuous Blonde
color_description: yellow with a little beige infusion

name: Walking on Mars
color_description: Raspberry red with green throat blending yellow.
description: Walking On Mars practically glows when you walk by. One of the memebers of our red breeding program, it sports a hyperpigmented pink bloom that looks like the most viberant intense red, and combines well with a vareity of other daylily pigments in crosses, or just makes a stunning clump if that is more of your pace.

name: Warrior Goddess
color_description:
Round and ruffled violet purple petals with 
pencil line platinum edges, lime green throat.
description: With a nice round flat forward facing bloom reminscient of a shield used by an Amazonian Warrior Goddess with a vibrant green eye and ruffled violet purple petals.

name: When You're Lonely
color_description: violet lavender with lighter watermark above green throat

name: Willie Graham
color_description: Purple, pink and chartreuse.
description: A new favorite bloom! When you see it you won't be able to look away from this pie plate of color. The flowers are easily 7 inches on a good day, but can be bigger. I have seem some flowers that are bigger than my head. A true stunner! I have lots of hope for this varieties kids. The lavender pigment and greys in its background make it ideal for enhancing modern flowers. If you are breeding for large blooms, this is for you.

name: Young Kitten
color_description: Light rose lavender with green to yellow center and pale violet watermark on the petals.
parentage: (Dream Sequence × Romance Is in the Air)

name: What a Relief
color_description: pale purple with violet eye and sculpted relief

name: Thoroughbred Kitty Cat
color_description: Pinkish lavender with green throat to star shaped, yellow eyezone.
description: This kitty has its paw on our heart. Magnificant in habit, Thoroughbred Kitty Cat is a combination of two knockout parents. It has great branching, tall scapes, good branching and bud count along with an unusual form flower of top of it all with vibrant hues of pink and lavender. It clawed its way to our top 5 favorites.

name: Theodore Klein
color_description: purple with violet pink watermark and white edge above green throat

name: Statuesque Beauty
color_description: Lavender blue with large, bright celadon to yellow throat extending onto petals and sepals, waxy substance.
description: We like it so much we'd be happy to hoarde it all to ourselves. A flower to lead one astray with with its statuesque tall straight scapes, with large waxy unfaiding blooms, that can be seen a mile away, insect resistant. Just wait till you see it!

name: Space-time Continuum
color_description: Lavender purple with deep green throat blending to creamy chartreuse watermark and violet pink halo.

name: Tsunami Ripples
color_description: Purple and violet purple edges on all segments, chartreuse to cream yellow throat, raised areas on top of petals are depressed on petal reverse, and raised areas on back of petals are depressed on front of petals.
description: Featured in the ADS Region 10 Daylily Appeal newsletter, Tsunami Ripples always creates quite a stir, with its undulating embossed and crimped petals. An exacting green throat that almost swallows the petals whole. One of three daylily that I have ever seen with this embossed trait, and the only one registered. UNIQUELY ONE OF A KIND.

name: Pins and Needles
color_description: yellow with amber rose highlights

name: Ruckus
color_description: yellow butterscotch bitone above green throat

name: Rouen Cathedral
color_description: cream with rose gold edge

name: Fountain of Youth
color_description: yellow pink peach with gold edge and strong green throat

name: Feminine Apparition
color_description: light cream pink bitone with lightly ruffled gold fringed edge

name: Evenly Divided
color_description: Dark lavender with prominent white midribs and chartreuse throat blending into yellow.

name: Crowning Achievement
color_description: bright pink with light yellow ruffles and teeth
description: Out of our most favorite tetraploid Truly Angelic that always throws tall well branched pink kids. Crowning Achievement is no exception.

name: Cynthia Wadsworth
color_description: Violet with blue feathering around bright yellow extended throat on petals and sepals, lightly ruffled, reflexed petals.
description: You just can't help but look at her, Cynthia Wadsworth always opens flat with recurved unusual form petals, with a glowing emerald green throat feathering out into a blue band with an ultraviolet indigo edge.

name: Clyde the Cockatoo
color_description: Light shell pink blushed lavender.
description: Tall and waxy, unbothered by the bugs, string scape, one you just have to see in person

name: Aerial Acrobatics
color_description: Lavender pink with green throat, twisted crispate.

name: All American Girl
color_description: light pink darkening to medium pink

name: Classy Columbus
color_description: purple with violet watermark and fine white gold edge

name: Color Melange
color_description: Purplish red and mauve blend.
description: Beloved for breeding by John for breeding, threw some of our most unique and distinctive introductions.

name: Brent Graham
color_description: Violet purple with white midribs.

name: Cool Yoga
color_description: Purple with green throat blending to yellow.

name: Dancing in the Street
color_description: Rich purple with white edges and bronze watermark.
description: An explosion of rejoicing and gayety, a dynamic bloom with endless motion that just keeps dancing and twirling, like the celebration that is Marde Gras, an attention grabber for sure.

name: Dark Matter
color_description: very dark violet with bright lime green eye

name: David Chamberlain
color_description: Rich purple.
description: A tall dark and handsome man who is always fashionably late to the party, with a bloom that can't be missed with its tall and upright habit that never fades.

name: Delicate Kiss
color_description: Light violet pink with green throat blending to chartreuse.

name: Details Matter
color_description: Dark violet purple with white midribs.

name: Drink the Wind
color_description: yellow with light beige rose infusions and fringy edge

name: Enamored of You
color_description: Violet lavender.

name: Estelle Rice
color_description: opalescent shell pink with deeply ruffled yellow gold edge and heavy substance
description: Named for John's mother how bad could it be? She was prim and proper. A favorite of our tet introductions, she has stood the test of time, and is still just as beloved as the first day she bloomed.

name: Falling in Love Again
color_description: clear lavender bitone with pronounced green throat and chalky lavender watermark

name: Fruity Overtones
color_description: rose with white midribs and green eye and slightly ruffled edge

name: Glowing Quasar
color_description: intense orange rose with yellow gold toothy edge

name: Graceful Late
color_description: light pink peach with frilly gold edge

name: Grand Gesture
color_description: royal purple bitone with violet watermark and gold edge above lime green throat

name: Greenwich Village
color_description: Violet lavender with green throat extending to yellow watermark.

name: Hazel Dougherty
color_description: Violet lavender.
description: A variety we named in honor of our favorite Region 10 diploid hybridizer from Knoxville TN, famous for her lavenders. Her program produced the basis of our own program. A superior lavender plant with excellent branching, great substance, and color fast fabulous waxy lavender petals that have a big green throat that does Hazel Doughtery's work justice.

name: Hey Mister Bud
color_description: vivid polychrome, ruffled light yellow edge with teeth and tendrils
description: Named after our favorite cat, Mister Bud. Probably one of our best teethy tets

name: Himalayan Pink
color_description: Soft pink bitone.

name: Ho-Ho-Kus
color_description: Mauve purple with chalky violet watermark.

name: I Can See Clearly Now
color_description: light lavender violet bitone with lime green to yellow throat

name: In High Regard
color_description: lavender with slight white midribs above bright lime green throat
description: This is the daylily that started our entire diploid progroam! In High Regard is the parent to both of our base plants, Dream Sequence and Blue Dolpin. It is a wonderful lavender with great sunstance, and always stands out in a patch of daylily with its distinct face.

name: Dunwalke
color_description: bright red with green eye

name: Energy Gain of One
color_description: Pale lavender.

name: Cletus Clatterback
color_description: neon yellow with lime green throat
description: Named after a strong and burley mountain man we once new. A true work horse of a man, and a work horse of a daylily with a bright green yellow bloom that can be seen across the garden

name: Purple Walrus
color_description: Purple with white midribs and light violet watermark.
description: A tall well branched variety. When we saw this Walrus of a plant in our seedling patch we knew immediately we had a keeper. Standing above the rest even on a dry year!

name: Scandinavia
color_description: glittering white self above lemon chartreuse throat
parentage: ((Miss Jessie × Loch Ness Monster) × (Radiant Moonbeam × Satin Bird))
description: Such a fun classic Mahieu variety with such a great upright habit with beautiful white flowers. It has thrown so many great children.

name: Purple Eclipse
color_description: velvety purple with blue sheen and white edge above chartreuse throat
description: A great dark flower that throws near black children

name: Isabelle Rose
color_description: pale yellow diamond dusted with little ruffled above extended green throat
description: A great white Stout Medal award winning variety. Has elegant white flowers
